bibl.title: Tradition and Innovation in Hellenistic Poetry.
bibl.note: Éd. originale: Muse e modelli. La poesia ellenistica da Alessandro Magno ad Augusto = Collezione storica (Roma - Bari, 2002).
FANTUZZI Marco and Richard HUNTER, Tradition and Innovation in Hellenistic Poetry.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2004, 8°, x-511 pp. ISBN 0-521-83511-9. £65.
